TextBody:
Hello,

You can find here the latest Ubuntu agents :

Ubuntu 20.04        
https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EPPClient_v2.4.2.1006/EPPClient_ubuntu_20.04_v2.4.2.1006_x86_64.tar.gz

Ubuntu 22.04        
https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EPPClient_v2.4.2.1006/EPPClient_ubuntu_22.04_v2.4.2.1006_x86_64.tar.gz

For Ubuntu 24.04 an epp agent will be available only in the next epp release 5.9.4.0.

Best Regards,
Alin
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0C7r2N:ref
Subject: EPP Agent for Ubuntu    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0C7r2N:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000C7r2N:ref

HI Alin,

thanks for the information.
The BMW-Linux support asked if you have also a supported agent for RedHat 7 and 8 and an approximate release date of epp 5.9.4.0.

Regards

Anatoli Lorenz
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #412617 - EPP Agent for Ubuntu

TextBody:
Hello,

I have attached the epp agents for Rhel :

Rhel 8.9        https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EPPClient_v2.4.2.1006/EPPClient_rhel_8.9_v2.4.2.1006_x86_64.tar.gz
Rhel 9.3        https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EPPClient_v2.4.2.1006/EPPClient_rhel_9.3_v2.4.2.1006_x86_64.tar.gz
Rhel 7.6        https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EPPClient_v1.8.0.0/EPPClient_RedHatEnterpriseServer_7.6_1807_x86_64.tar.gz

Regarding epp 5.9.4.0 release, it is targeted for July 2024.
   
Best Regards,
Alin
